thread.section_title: Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Chic and luxury
thread.title_full: Chic and luxury - Review of Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rmseasons
title: Chic and luxury
text:
This is one of the world best hotels I have ever visited!
The hotel inside is a modern chic palace! This is a modern masterpiece made by Mr Stark!
The breakfasts are absolutely great! They have a lot of things for the ones who really care about clean and natural food such as wheat cocktails etc.
It was an incredible adventure staying at this hotel.
Thnks to the concierges! They recommended us very nice restaurants and clubs close to the hotel and shopping streets in walk distance.
Room Tip: All are great i guess See more room tips
